title: CAN SOMEONE PLZ HELP ME!!!! :(
body: Ever sense the last patch 5.4 my FPS has dropped from 60 to 15! ever play with 15 FPS IT SUCKS! Is like day before patch 60 + after 15 - and a shit load of lag spikes.so i went to the riot fps support page and did literately everything they said to do and its still on 15..... idk what to do anymore RIOT HOW AM I SUPPOSE TO BUY MORE RP IF I CANT PLAY! like its starting to get annoying! if anyone knows what to do plz help me plzzzzzzzzzzz  :'(
